oai_dc:dc.dc:title: New York Daily Tribune issue reporting on the 1863 siege of Knoxville
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Description of the death and funeral of Gen. William P. Sanders and list of Union killed and wounded at the Nov. 29, 1863 Battle at Fort Sanders and a separate engagement at Campbell's Station. These articles from correspondents in the field contain much detail about the fortification of Knoxville by Union engineers, a fight along Kingston Pike and an account of the extended siege of Knoxville by Gen. James Longstreet's Confederate army.
